front.title: Generalized Labels for the Flexi-Grid in Lambda-Switch-Capable (LSC) Label Switching Routers

abstract.t: A new flexible wavelength grid ("flexi-grid") is being developed within the ITU-T Study Group 15 to allow selection and switching of individual lambdas chosen flexibly from a detailed, fine granularity grid of available wavelengths. This document updates the definition of GMPLS lambda labels to support the flexi-grid. This document updates RFC 3471 and updates RFC 6205.
